Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a pale red-brown pottery vessel, the fabric is greyish in section, the exterior is covered with a red-brown slip and remains of four lines of black-painted demotic text.
Curator's comments: Being studied for publication by Bryan Kraemer. Cemeteries and Osireion Excavations Group
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393794) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393794)
